title: The noble souldier. Or, A contract broken, justly reveng'd A tragedy. Written by S.R.
author: Rowley, Samuel, d. 1633?
publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Nicholas Vavasour, and are to be sold at his shop in the Temple, neere the Church,
notes: S.R. = Samuel Rowley; but often attributed to Thomas Dekker, and possibly revised by him from a work by Rowley. Probably with additions by John Day.
Running title reads: The noble Spanish souldier.
